projects.title: Surfstore
projects.description: A file storage application that lets users sync files to and from the cloud.

projects.title: DejaPhoto
projects.description: An android app that allows users to have a changing phone background of their photos, as well as their friend's photos, based on the time, day, and place the photo was taken.

projects.title: UCSD Web Components Library
projects.description: Developed part of an open-source UC San Diego web components library and compiled them to form a service called Rate-it, a service like Reddit but with a rating system.

projects.title: Router Implementation
projects.description: Built a simple router that runs in a virtual machine given a static network topology and routing table, which processes raw ethernet frames and forwards them to the correct outgoing interface.

projects.title: Gomoku AI Solver
projects.description: Used Monte Carlo Tree Search algorithm method to implement an artificially intelligent agent to play the game of Gomoku, also known as Gobang or Go

projects.title: Hotspotify
projects.description: A web application that lets Spotify users view their most played music tracks and artists
